name: AnaplasmosisTestsForAnaplasmaSpeciesByCultureAndIdentificationMethod
title: Anaplasmosis (Tests for Anaplasma species by Culture and Identification Method)
purpose:
(Clinical Focus: This set of values contains codes for laboratory test names associated with detecting the presence of Anaplasma species in culture.),(Data Element Scope: Laboratory tests names that were ordered or observed.),(Inclusion Criteria: component: Anaplasma culture;
